item.title: R Studio and Python Play Together!
item.description: Although there is much debate regarding the superiority of R vs.Â Python, both of these languages can be extremely useful and operate very well. Throughout this SDS 348, we have mostly used R studio but have delved into Python as well. We have even learned that these two languages can be used in coordination with one another using the Reticulate package. This package allows R and Python to play together as exemplified with this riddle below.
